page.title: 04Frontier Nightclub
page.content: The FRONTIER is in Batley.It is between Batley and Dewsbury on Bradford Road.It is open Wednesday 7.30 p.m. until 12.30 a.m.,Thursday 7.30 p.m. until 1.00 a.m. and Friday and Saturday 7.30 p.m. until 2.00 a.m. and provides live entertainment and has installed new lasers for the Disco.It can hold approximatley two thousand people.You also have to be over twenty to be let in,and it will not accept groups.You are exepted to be smart and tidy in your appearance .Food and drink is also served and it was voted club of the year for 1984/85 and is the North's biggest and brighteat night scene.The only way to obtain tickets,is by calling personally at the booking office or by post.The Frontier(previously known as Batley Variety Club) attracts many top stars like,Cannon and Ball.
